formattedAddress: 386 W Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 386 W Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text:
On my recent trip to SoHo, I had the pleasure of stepping into the Luca Faloni store. The store itself is a visual delight, seamlessly blending contemporary design elements with classic Italian aesthetics. The warm lighting and meticulously arranged displays instantly draw you into a world of luxury and elegance.

As I browsed through their collection, the exceptional quality of each piece became evident. The cashmere sweaters felt incredibly soft to touch, each stitch telling a tale of skilled Italian craftsmanship. The linen shirts, crisp and beautifully tailored, stood out as a testament to the brand's commitment to quality.

But beyond the products, what truly enhanced my shopping experience was the staff. They were not only well-versed with the brand's offerings but also passionately shared the stories behind the materials, the design inspiration, and the artisans who breathe life into these creations. Such insights added depth to each purchase, making it more than just a transaction.

Additionally, the store's ambiance, with its soothing background music and subtle fragrances, created an environment where shopping felt leisurely and enjoyable, rather than rushed. Thoughtful seating areas and well-lit fitting rooms further elevated the overall experience.

In the realm of luxury menswear, Luca Faloni stands out not just for its exceptional products but also for curating a shopping experience that feels both personal and grand. If you appreciate the finer things in life and have a penchant for timeless style, the Luca Faloni store in SoHo is more than just a shopping destination; it's an immersion into a world of sartorial excellence.

originalText.text: I just received the chocolate brown weekender bag, and I must say that I am thrilled beyond words.  The bag smells amazing and seems to be of the highest quality leather possible.  The design is exquisite and a perfect size.  After many hours of research of many leather bag options out there,  I am so glad I chose to go with Luca Faloni!  Thank you!

originalText.text:
Milan fashion is alive and well at Luca Faloni’s Soho storefront! I was there recently for some new shirts and pants. The quality and service was fantastic.

Stop by to see the “bella figura” in action. I plan to be back soon!

text.text:
Milan fashion is alive and well at Luca Faloni’s Soho storefront! I was there recently for some new shirts and pants. The quality and service was fantastic.

Stop by to see the “bella figura” in action. I plan to be back soon!

originalText.text: This store is my new favorite place to get clothes. They look good, feel good and are of made of high quality Italian fabrics. For the quality of the garments they’re actually quite reasonably priced. Joseph at the SOHO location is also an all-star when it comes to customer service. I found this place while on business in NYC and Joe helped me pick out some great stuff. When I wanted to get help selecting more stuff for myself and getting gifts, I called the store and Joe was able to help me and did so with a friendliness, enthusiasm and great attitude. Also, he is thoughtful and knowledgeable and helped me pick some great things for myself and for gifts. The only thing I would change is to have them make some of their pants longer (I’m 6’6”) From the products to the team LF delivers and I will keep shopping here for years. The best kept secret in men’s clothing!

originalText.text: Top quality shirt!  Shipped from Italy to my door in just a couple of days.  Awesome!  Give this company a try, you will not be disapointed.
